Section.Catchline: Haul seine and trawl permits; Lake Okeechobee; fees.

Subsection.Text: The Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission is authorized to issue permits for each haul seine or trawl used in Lake Okeechobee.
The commission may charge an annual fee for the issuance of such permits which shall not exceed:

Paragraph.Text: For a resident haul seine permit, $100.
For a nonresident or alien trawl or haul seine permit, $500.
